name: Lemme Vacuum Your Room
description:
Goal:
Doomba has one goal and one goal only - it must vacuum everything.

So, naturally, he travels to an apartment building to vacuum up everything in people’s rooms.

He can’t vacuum up the people though, which annoys him, so he kills them by shooting out fireballs made from the stuff he sucked in.

The fireballs can only be made in his body when he’s sucked in everything else in the room.

He has to do all of this quickly though, because the police are after him. So he has to clear all the rooms within the time limit.

Controls:

Move: WASD

Look around: Mouse cursor

Vacuum: Left Click

Shoot fireball: Right Click

Incredible Image:

Credits:

Created for the UF Game Development Association (GDA) Game Jam (48 hours).

Developed by Team Shadow Suckers:

    RoboZero = Level programmer

    AndyTr = Gameplay programmer

    feli.sol = Background artist
